title: Alternative National Anthems | Guest: Dr. Benjamin Merkle | 7/15/20
description:
Glenn tells the true history of a Revolutionary War veteran, preacher, and abolitionist whom you’ve probably never heard of. Some businesses are backing the blue amid the “defund the police” movement. When is the average American going to have a “second tower” moment and realize we’re under attack from the radical Left? Chicago’s mayor calls on her own version of Batman to fix her Census problem. Calls to replace the national anthem are growing, and Glenn has a few suggestions. America is falling apart fast as Marxists aim to destroy the nuclear family. New Saint Andrews College President Dr. Benjamin Merkle joins to discuss how college campuses have become the “ultimate deep state” and what we must start teaching again.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
